ceremony.description: High directional or stained-glass light with soft fill; faces readable and banners highlighted.

council.description: Even overhead illumination; consistent glow on central tables and displays.

engineering.description: Harsh task lighting with reflective metal surfaces and visible status indicators.

collapse.description: Unsteady emergency lighting, intermittent strobes, and partial power loss.

ritual.description: Soft perimeter glow with shallow shadows; calm, contemplative illumination.
